text: Her sutelað hu Alfric arcebisceop his cwyde gedihte.
Þæt is ærest him to saulsceate he becwæð into cristes cyrcan þæt land æt Wyllan & æt Burnan & Risenbeorgas.
And he becwað his laford his beste scip & þa segelgeræda ðarto &LXhealma &LXbeornena.
& he wilnode gif hit his lafordes willa wære þæt he gefaestnode into sancte Albane þæt land æt Cyngesbyrig & fenge sylf wið þam eft to Eadulfingtune.
An he becwæð þæt land æt Dumeltun into Abbandune & Ælfnoðe ðarofIIIhida his dæg and suððan to þan oþaran to Abbandune.
&Xoxan &IImen he him becwæð & filgan hi þam lafordscype þætte þæt land to hyre.
And he cwæð þæt land æt Wealingaforda þe he gebohte Celewærde & hofer his dæg into Ceolesige.

& he becwæð into sancte Albane þæt land æt Tiwan & standan þa forword betweonan þan abbode & Ceolrice ðe ær wið ðæne arcebiscop geforwyrd wæron, þæt is þæt Ceolric habbe ðæne dæl þæs landes þe he hæfð his dæg & eac ðæne dæl þe se arcebisceop for his sceatte him to let, þæt wæs ehtoðe healf hid wiðVpundun &Lmancusum goldes, & ga hit ofer his dæg eall togædere into sancte Albæne.
& heora forewyrd wæron þæt Osanig æfter Ceolrices dæge gange eac þyderin.
& þæt land on Lundene þe he mid his feo gebohte he becwæð into sancte Albæne & his bec ealle he cwæð eac þyderin & his geteld.
And he becwæð þæt man fenge on þe feoh ðe man hæfde & ærest ælcne borh agulde & suððan tilode to his hergeatwæn þæs ðe man habban sceolde.
And anes scipes he geuðe þam folce to Cent & oþres to Wiltunescire.
& elles on oðrum þingum gif þæs hwæt wære he bæd þæt Uulfstan bisceop & Leofric abbud dihton swa heom best þuhte.
And þe land be westan æt Fittingtune & æt Niwantune he becwæð his sweostrun & heora beornun.
& Ælfheages land Esnes suna ga a on his cyn.
And he becwæð Uulfstane ærcebiscope ane sweorrode & anne ring & anne psaltere & Alfheage biscope anne rode.
And he forgeaf on Godes est Centingan þæne borh þe hy hym sceoldan & Middelsexon & Suðrion þæt feoh þæt heom fore sceat.
And he wyle þæt man freoge æfter his dæge ælene witefæstne man þe on his timan forgylt wære.
Gif hwa þæt is awende hæbbe him wið God gemaene.
